properties.name: deezer.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Deezer starter. Set to false to completely disable the Deezer client configuration.

properties.name: deezer.client-type
properties.description: Type of HTTP client to use for Deezer API calls. REACTIVE uses WebClient (recommended for high concurrency), BLOCKING uses RestTemplate (simpler but less scalable).

properties.name: deezer.cache.cleanup-interval
properties.description: Cache cleanup interval in milliseconds. How often expired entries are removed from the cache.

values.description: Use WebClient for non-blocking I/O (recommended for high concurrency applications like games)
Use RestTemplate for blocking I/O (simpler but less scalable)
Enable caching to improve performance by reducing redundant API calls
Disable caching - all API calls will be made directly
